main event: On 26 October 1958, two men encountered a large, flat, egg-shaped object hovering near a bridge north of Baltimore, Maryland. The automobile they were in experienced a complete electrical failure when they approached the object, which subsequently emitted a bright flash and loud noise before ascending vertically.
interesting points: The object was reported to be approximately 75 to 100 feet long and glowed with a fluorescent light., Witnesses experienced a burning sensation on their faces during the encounter., The sighting lasted about one minute and was reported to local authorities immediately after., The electrical failure of the car was well noted as a critical factor during the event., Local police and hospital records confirm the witness accounts of the incident.
